mng: to change or replace, to experience, one of the five two hour periods into which the night was formerly divided, watch (e.g. of a sentry or guard)
more, even more, further, still, still more

exm.mng: to replace the old with new, to renew, to renovate, to upgrade, to update, to regenerate
to replace (a worn-out tire etc), to change (one's address etc)
